search.query: | mstats sum(_value) as value where `telegraf_kafka_index` metric_name="kafka_topic.MessagesInPerSec.Count" OR metric_name="kafka_topics.BytesInPerSec.OneMinuteRate" OR metric_name="kafka_topics.BytesOutPerSec.OneMinuteRate" env=$env$ label=$label$ jolokia_agent_url=* by metric_name, jolokia_agent_url | eval {metric_name}=value | stats first(kafka_topic.MessagesInPerSec.Count) as "messages" first(kafka_topics.BytesInPerSec.OneMinuteRate) as BytesIn, first(kafka_topics.BytesOutPerSec.OneMinuteRate) as BytesOut by jolokia_agent_url | eventstats sum(messages) as total_messages, sum(BytesIn) as total_BytesIn, sum(BytesOut) as total_BytesOut | eval percent_messages=round(messages/total_messages*100, 2), percent_BytesIn=round(BytesIn/total_BytesIn*100, 2), percent_BytesOut=round(BytesOut/total_BytesOut*100, 2) | fields jolokia_agent_url, percent_* | where jolokia_agent_url="$jolokia_agent_url$" | fields percent_* | appendcols [ | mcatalog values(partition) as partition where `telegraf_kafka_index` metric_name="kafka_partition.Size" env="*" label="*" jolokia_agent_url="$jolokia_agent_url$" by topic, jolokia_agent_url | stats count by topic, partition | stats count as dcount_partition, dc(topic) as dcount_topic ] | transpose | rename column as Data, "row 1" as Rate | rex field=Data mode=sed "s/dcount_partition/# of Partitions/g" | rex field=Data mode=sed "s/dcount_topic/# of Topics/g" | rex field=Data mode=sed "s/percent_messages/% of Messages/g" | rex field=Data mode=sed "s/percent_BytesIn/% of Incoming/g" | rex field=Data mode=sed "s/percent_BytesOut/% of Outgoing/g" | eval order=case(Data="# of Topics", 0, Data="# of Partitions", 1, Data="% of Messages", 2, Data="% of Incoming", 3, Data="% of Outgoing", 4) | sort order | fields - order

metric_name="kafka_topics.BytesRejectedPerSec.FiveMinuteRate" OR metric_name="kafka_topics.BytesRejectedPerSec.FifteenMinuteRate" OR metric_name="kafka_topics.FailedFetchRequestsPerSec.MeanRate" OR "[^\.]*\.(?<rate>[^\.]*)\." | eval {metric_name}=value | stats first(kafka_topics.*) as "*" by rate, jolokia_agent_url | eval Mean=case(isnotnull('FailedProduceRequestsPerSec.MeanRate'), 'FailedProduceRequestsPerSec.MeanRate', isnotnull('FailedFetchRequestsPerSec.MeanRate'), 'FailedFetchRequestsPerSec.MeanRate', isnotnull('BytesRejectedPerSec.MeanRate'), 'BytesRejectedPerSec.MeanRate', isnotnull('BytesInPerSec.MeanRate'), 'BytesInPerSec.MeanRate', isnotnull('BytesOutPerSec.MeanRate'), 'BytesOutPerSec.MeanRate', isnotnull('MessagesInPerSec.MeanRate'), 'MessagesInPerSec.MeanRate') | eval 1min=case(isnotnull('FailedProduceRequestsPerSec.OneMinuteRate'), 'FailedProduceRequestsPerSec.OneMinuteRate', isnotnull('FailedFetchRequestsPerSec.OneMinuteRate'), 'FailedFetchRequestsPerSec.OneMinuteRate', isnotnull('BytesRejectedPerSec.OneMinuteRate'), 'BytesRejectedPerSec.OneMinuteRate', isnotnull('BytesInPerSec.OneMinuteRate'), 'BytesInPerSec.OneMinuteRate', isnotnull('BytesOutPerSec.OneMinuteRate'), 'BytesOutPerSec.OneMinuteRate', isnotnull('MessagesInPerSec.OneMinuteRate'), 'MessagesInPerSec.OneMinuteRate') | eval 5min=case(isnotnull('FailedProduceRequestsPerSec.FiveMinuteRate'), 'FailedProduceRequestsPerSec.FiveMinuteRate', isnotnull('FailedFetchRequestsPerSec.FiveMinuteRate'), 'FailedFetchRequestsPerSec.FiveMinuteRate', isnotnull('BytesRejectedPerSec.FiveMinuteRate'), 'BytesRejectedPerSec.FiveMinuteRate', isnotnull('BytesInPerSec.FiveMinuteRate'), 'BytesInPerSec.FiveMinuteRate', isnotnull('BytesOutPerSec.FiveMinuteRate'), 'BytesOutPerSec.FiveMinuteRate', isnotnull('MessagesInPerSec.FiveMinuteRate'), 'MessagesInPerSec.FiveMinuteRate') | eval 15min=case(isnotnull('FailedProduceRequestsPerSec.FifteenMinuteRate'), 'FailedProduceRequestsPerSec.FifteenMinuteRate', isnotnull('FailedFetchRequestsPerSec.FifteenMinuteRate'), 'FailedFetchRequestsPerSec.FifteenMinuteRate', isnotnull('BytesRejectedPerSec.FifteenMinuteRate'), 'BytesRejectedPerSec.FifteenMinuteRate', isnotnull('BytesInPerSec.FifteenMinuteRate'), 'BytesInPerSec.FifteenMinuteRate', isnotnull('BytesOutPerSec.FifteenMinuteRate'), 'BytesOutPerSec.FifteenMinuteRate', isnotnull('MessagesInPerSec.FifteenMinuteRate'), 'MessagesInPerSec.FifteenMinuteRate') | fields rate, jolokia_agent_url, Mean, 1min, 5min, 15min | stats avg(*) as "*" by rate | fields rate, Mean, 1min, 5min, 15min | foreach Mean, 1min, 5min, 15min [ eval "<<FIELD>>" = if(rate="BytesInPerSec" OR rate="BytesOutPerSec", round('<<FIELD>>'/1024, 2), '<<FIELD>>') ] | rex field=rate mode=sed "s/BytesInPerSec/KBytesInPerSec/g" | rex field=rate mode=sed "s/BytesOutPerSec/KBytesOutPerSec/g" | eval order=case(rate="MessagesInPerSec", 0, rate="KBytesInPerSec", 1, rate="KBytesOutPerSec", 2, rate="BytesRejectedPerSec", 3, rate="FailedFetchRequestsPerSec", 4, rate="FailedProduceRequestsPerSec", 5) | sort order | fields - order | foreach Mean, 1min, 5min, 15min [ eval "<<FIELD>>" = round('<<FIELD>>', 2) ] | rename 1min as "1 min", 5min as "5 min", 15min as "15 min" | rex field=rate mode=sed "s/MessagesInPerSec/Messages in \/sec/g" | rex field=rate mode=sed "s/KBytesInPerSec/KBytes in \/sec/g" | rex field=rate mode=sed "s/KBytesOutPerSec/KBytes out \/sec/g" | rex field=rate mode=sed "s/BytesRejectedPerSec/Bytes rejected \/sec/g" | rex field=rate mode=sed "s/FailedFetchRequestsPerSec/Failed fetch request \/sec/g" | rex field=rate mode=sed "s/FailedProduceRequestsPerSec/Failed produce request \/sec/g" | rename rate as Rate

| mstats avg(_value) as value where `telegraf_kafka_index` metric_name="kafka_topics.BytesOutPerSec.OneMinuteRate" OR metric_name="kafka_topics.BytesInPerSec.OneMinuteRate" OR metric_name="kafka_topics.MessagesInPerSec.OneMinuteRate" env=$env$ label=$label$ jolokia_agent_url="$jolokia_agent_url$" span=10s by metric_name, jolokia_agent_url | eval {metric_name}=value | stats first(kafka_topics.*.OneMinuteRate) as "*" by _time, jolokia_agent_url | eval KBytesInPerSec=BytesInPerSec/1024, KBytesOutPerSec=BytesOutPerSec/1024 | timechart `telegraf_kafka_span` avg(MessagesInPerSec) as "Messages/sec", avg(KBytesInPerSec) as "KBytesIn/sec", avg(KBytesOutPerSec) as "KBytesOut/sec"

search.query: | mstats latest(_value) as value where `telegraf_kafka_index` metric_name=kafka_partition.UnderReplicatedPartitions env=$env$ label=$label$ jolokia_agent_url="$jolokia_agent_url$" by env, label, jolokia_agent_url, topic, partition, metric_name | stats dc(partition) as "Partitions on broker", values(partition) as "Partitions" by topic | mvexpand Partitions | sort limit=0 Partitions | stats first(*) as "*", list(Partitions) as Partitions by topic | mvcombine Partitions | rex field=Partitions mode=sed "s/ /,/g" | eval Partitions = "(" . Partitions . ")" | append [ | mstats latest(_value) as value where `telegraf_kafka_index` metric_name=kafka_partition.UnderReplicatedPartitions env=$env$ label=$label$ by env, label, jolokia_agent_url, topic, partition, metric_name | eval {metric_name}=value | stats first(kafka_partition.*) as "*" by jolokia_agent_url, topic, partition | fields jolokia_agent_url, topic, partition, UnderReplicatedPartitions | stats dc(partition) as "# Partitions", count as "Replication", sum(UnderReplicatedPartitions) as "# UnderReplicatedPartitions" by topic | eval "Replication" = ('Replication'+'# UnderReplicatedPartitions')/'# Partitions' | rename "# Partitions" as "Total Partitions" | fields topic, "Total Partitions", "Replication"] | append [ | mstats latest(_value) as value where `telegraf_kafka_index` metric_name=kafka_partition.Size env=$env$ label=$label$ jolokia_agent_url="$jolokia_agent_url$" by jolokia_agent_url, topic, partition | stats sum(value) as Size by topic | eval "Size MB"=round('Size'/1024/1024, 3) | fields topic, "Size MB" ] | stats first(*) as "*" by topic | where isnotnull('Partitions on broker') | fields topic, "Replication", "Total Partitions", "Partitions on broker", "Size MB", Partitions | sort limit=0 topic
